Label.text: Legend of Zelda: A tech demo

Welcome to the tech demo!

Squeeze / press the hand grip to change weapons / items. Some weapons use the trigger to shoot.

You start with the following items:
 - Sword
 - Shield
 - Basic Boomerang
 - Bombs
 - A Map (This fills out as you walk around)

Killing all the enemies in a room may result in a reward / event being triggered.

Your goal is to kill the boss and get to the triforce room.

Click Play to start!
